title: Shareable Copy Link action in global navigation

requirements.summary: Add a global "Copy Link" action that copies the current page URL and shows success/error feedback while preserving the luxury theme and responsive layout.
acceptanceCriteria: A clearly labeled action (e.g., "Copy Link") is available in a discoverable global location (header or footer) and works on both desktop and mobile.
Clicking the action copies window.location.href to the clipboard.
A success confirmation is shown in English (e.g., "Link copied") and an error message is shown if clipboard access fails (e.g., "Could not copy link").
The feature preserves the existing luxury theme (black/gold styling) and does not break layout at common responsive breakpoints.

file_operations.description: Create a small React hook that attempts to copy window.location.href to the clipboard (prefer navigator.clipboard; include a safe fallback) and returns success/error state for UI messaging.

Add a reusable "Copy Link" button component styled to match the existing black/gold luxury theme, calling the copy hook and rendering an inline success/error confirmation (English) suitable for both desktop and mobile.

Wire the new CopyLinkButton into a discoverable global location in the header: include it in the desktop CTA area and also in the mobile Sheet menu so it remains accessible on small screens without breaking existing layout or navigation.
